item.title: DisCoRD: Discrete Tokens to Continuous Motion via Rectified Flow Decoding
item.description: DisCoRD: Rectified flow decodes discrete motion tokens into continuous, natural movement, balancing faithfulness and realism.

item.title: MaskRIS: Semantic Distortion-aware Data Augmentation for Referring Image Segmentation
item.description: MaskRIS revolutionizes referring image segmentation by using novel masking and contextual learning to enhance data augmentation, achieving state-of-the-art results.
